element-type.name: inputSuggest
element-type.description: Provides an input textbox with "suggest" functionality.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.

attribute-type.name: converter
attribute-type.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter.

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating that this component's value must be converted and validated immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase), rather than waiting until Process Validations phase.

attribute-type.name: required
attribute-type.description: If true, this component will be checked for non-empty input.

attribute-type.name: validator
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at a method that will be called during Process Validations phase of the request processing lifecycle, to validate the current value of this component.

attribute-type.name: valueChangeListener
attribute-type.description: Listener for value changes.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

attribute-type.name: forceId
attribute-type.description: If true, this component will force the use of the specified id when rendering.

attribute-type.name: forceIdIndex
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not append a '[n]' suffix (where 'n' is the row index) to components that are contained within a "list." This value will be true by default and the value will be ignored if the value of forceId is false (or not specified.)

attribute-type.name: javascriptLocation
attribute-type.description: An alternate location to find javascript resources. If no values is specified, javascript will be loaded from the resources directory using AddResource and ExtensionsFilter.

attribute-type.name: imageLocation
attribute-type.description: An alternate location to find image resources. If no values is specified, images will be loaded from the resources directory using AddResource and ExtensionsFilter.

attribute-type.name: styleLocation
attribute-type.description: An alternate location to find stylesheet resources. If no values is specified, stylesheets will be loaded from the resources directory using AddResource and ExtensionsFilter.

element-type.name: planner
element-type.description: A meeting planner component, similar to the ones found in Outlook or Evolution.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

element-type.name: schedule
element-type.description: A schedule component similar to the ones found in Outlook or Evolution

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: action
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property.

attribute-type.name: actionListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at method acception an ActionEvent with return type void.

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.

element-type.name: inputSuggestAjax
element-type.description: Provides an input textbox with "suggest" functionality, using a remote connection to the server. The difference to inputSuggest is that a custom drop down is rendered.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.

attribute-type.name: converter
attribute-type.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter.

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating that this component's value must be converted and validated immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase), rather than waiting until Process Validations phase.

attribute-type.name: required
attribute-type.description: If true, this component will be checked for non-empty input.

attribute-type.name: validator
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at a method that will be called during Process Validations phase of the request processing lifecycle, to validate the current value of this component.

attribute-type.name: valueChangeListener
attribute-type.description: Listener for value changes.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

attribute-type.name: forceId
attribute-type.description: If true, this component will force the use of the specified id when rendering.

attribute-type.name: forceIdIndex
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not append a '[n]' suffix (where 'n' is the row index) to components that are contained within a "list." This value will be true by default and the value will be ignored if the value of forceId is false (or not specified.)

attribute-type.name: javascriptLocation
attribute-type.description: An alternate location to find javascript resources. If no values is specified, javascript will be loaded from the resources directory using AddResource and ExtensionsFilter.

attribute-type.name: imageLocation
attribute-type.description: An alternate location to find image resources. If no values is specified, images will be loaded from the resources directory using AddResource and ExtensionsFilter.

attribute-type.name: styleLocation
attribute-type.description: An alternate location to find stylesheet resources. If no values is specified, stylesheets will be loaded from the resources directory using AddResource and ExtensionsFilter.

attribute-type.name: displayValueOnly
attribute-type.description: If true, renders only the value of the component, but no input widget. Default is false.

attribute-type.name: displayValueOnlyStyle
attribute-type.description: Style used when displayValueOnly is true.

attribute-type.name: displayValueOnlyStyleClass
attribute-type.description: Style class used when displayValueOnly is true.

attribute-type.name: enabledOnUserRole
attribute-type.description: If user is in given role, this component will be rendered normally. If not, no hyperlink is rendered but all nested tags (=body) are rendered.

attribute-type.name: visibleOnUserRole
attribute-type.description: If user is in given role, this component will be rendered normally. If not, nothing is rendered and the body of this tag will be skipped.

attribute-type.name: suggestedItemsMethod
attribute-type.description: Reference to the method which returns the suggested items

attribute-type.name: maxSuggestedItems
attribute-type.description: optional attribute to identify the max size of suggested Values

attribute-type.name: popupStyle
attribute-type.description: Style for the window with a suggested list of items;pop up for each incoming Ajax response

attribute-type.name: popupStyleClass
attribute-type.description: StyleClass for the window with a suggested list of items;pop up for each incoming Ajax response

attribute-type.name: popupId
attribute-type.description: Id for the pop up window

attribute-type.name: listId
attribute-type.description: Id for the unordered list included in the pop up window

attribute-type.name: listStyle
attribute-type.description: Style for the unordered list included in the pop up window

attribute-type.name: listStyleClass
attribute-type.description: StyleClass for the unordered list included in the pop up window

attribute-type.name: listItemStyle
attribute-type.description: Id for the pop up window

attribute-type.name: listItemStyleClass
attribute-type.description: Id for the pop up window

element-type.name: form
element-type.description: Renders a HTML form element which allow defining a different scheme, servername or port for the action url to which the form is submited

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

attribute-type.name: scheme
attribute-type.description: This attribute can be used to set the url scheme for the action attribute

attribute-type.name: serverName
attribute-type.description: This attribute can be used to set the url server name or ip address for the action attribute

attribute-type.name: port
attribute-type.description: This attribute can be used to set the port for the action attribute

element-type.name: validateUrl
element-type.description: A custom validator for url format, based upons Jakarta Commons.

element-type.name: autoUpdateDataTable
element-type.description: Extended data_table that adds some additional features to the standard data_table action: see attribute descriptions for preserveDataModel, sortColumn, sortAscending and preserveSort.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: Supported types see JSF Spec 4.1.3

attribute-type.name: forceId
attribute-type.description: If true, this component will force the use of the specified id when rendering.

attribute-type.name: forceIdIndex
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not append a '[n]' suffix (where 'n' is the row index) to components that are contained within a "list." This value will be true by default and the value will be ignored if the value of forceId is false (or not specified.)

attribute-type.name: enabledOnUserRole
attribute-type.description: If user is in given role, this component will be rendered normally. If not, no hyperlink is rendered but all nested tags (=body) are rendered.

attribute-type.name: visibleOnUserRole
attribute-type.description: If user is in given role, this component will be rendered normally. If not, nothing is rendered and the body of this tag will be skipped.

attribute-type.name: preserveDataModel
attribute-type.description: Indicates whether the state of the whole DataModel should be saved and restored. Default: false

attribute-type.name: sortColumn
attribute-type.description: Value reference to a model property that gives the current sort column name.

attribute-type.name: sortAscending
attribute-type.description: Value reference to a model property that gives the current sort direction.

attribute-type.name: preserveSort
attribute-type.description: Indicates whether the state of the sortColumn and sortAscending attribute should be saved and restored and written back to the model during the update model phase. Default: true

attribute-type.name: renderedIfEmpty
attribute-type.description: Indicates whether this table should be rendered if the underlying DataModel is empty. You could as well use rendered="#{not empty bean.list}", but this one causes the getList method of your model bean beeing called up to five times per request, which is not optimal when the list is backed by a DB table. Using renderedIfEmpty="false" solves this problem, because the MyFaces extended HtmlDataTable automatically caches the DataModel and calles the model getter only once per request. Default: true

attribute-type.name: rowIndexVar
attribute-type.description: A parameter name, under which the current rowIndex is set in request scope similar to the var parameter.

attribute-type.name: rowCountVar
attribute-type.description: A parameter name, under which the rowCount is set in request scope similar to the var parameter.

attribute-type.name: previousRowDataVar
attribute-type.description: A parameter name, under which the previous RowData Object is set in request scope similar to the rowIndexVar and rowCountVar parameters. Mind that the value of this request scope attribute is null in the first row or when isRowAvailable returns false for the previous row.

attribute-type.name: rowOnMouseOver
attribute-type.description: Defines a JavaScript onmouseover event handler for each table row

attribute-type.name: rowOnMouseOut
attribute-type.description: Defines a JavaScript onmouseout event handler for each table row

attribute-type.name: frequency
attribute-type.description: Defines in seconds the interval of reloads. if no value is specified 2 seconds will be default.

element-type.name: convertBoolean
element-type.description: Converts a boolean to custom format (yes/no), (1/0), etc.

attribute-type.name: trueValue
attribute-type.description: Value representing a boolean true, e.g. TRUE, yes, 1, etc.

attribute-type.name: falseValue
attribute-type.description: Value representing a boolean false, e.g. FALSE, no, 0, etc.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: forceId
attribute-type.description: If true, this component will force the use of the specified id when rendering.

attribute-type.name: forceIdIndex
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not append a '[n]' suffix (where 'n' is the row index) to components that are contained within a "list." This value will be true by default and the value will be ignored if the value of forceId is false (or not specified.)

attribute-type.name: enabledOnUserRole
attribute-type.description: If user is in given role, this component will be rendered normally. If not, no hyperlink is rendered but all nested tags (=body) are rendered.

attribute-type.name: visibleOnUserRole
attribute-type.description: If user is in given role, this component will be rendered normally. If not, nothing is rendered and the body of this tag will be skipped.

attribute-type.name: style
attribute-type.description: The style to use for this div.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: The class to use for this div.

attribute-type.name: legend
attribute-type.description: The fieldset's legend.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Component binding.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

attribute-type.name: enabledOnUserRole
attribute-type.description: If user is in given role, this component will be rendered normally. If not, no hyperlink is rendered but all nested tags (=body) are rendered.

attribute-type.name: visibleOnUserRole
attribute-type.description: If user is in given role, this component will be rendered normally. If not, nothing is rendered and the body of this tag will be skipped.

attribute-type.name: forceId
attribute-type.description: If true, this component will force the use of the specified id when rendering.

attribute-type.name: forceIdIndex
attribute-type.description: If false, this component will not append a '[n]' suffix (where 'n' is the row index) to components that are contained within a "list." This value will be true by default and the value will be ignored if the value of forceId is false (or not specified.)

attribute-type.name: getContentTypeMethod
attribute-type.description: Reference to the method which returns the image's content type as a String.

attribute-type.name: getBytesMethod
attribute-type.description: Reference to the method which returns the image's bytes as a byte[].
